TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataControlExtensions extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Provides extension methods that are used by ASP.NET Dynamic Data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.DataControlExtensions> class is used to enable Dynamic Data features in ASP.NET data-bound controls.
## Examples For an example of how to enable Dynamic Data features in a data-bound control, see [Walkthrough: Enabling Dynamic Data in ASP.NET Data-Bound Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/c170c9df-54f2-4fee-ad9f-33f2a882928f).

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnableDynamicData (this System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, Type entityType);
.method public static hidebysig void EnableDynamicData(class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, class System.Type entityType) cil managed

Docs.param: The data control to enable Dynamic Data behavior for.
The type to use for metadata.
Docs.summary: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnableDynamicData (this System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, Type entityType, System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<string,object> defaultValues);

.method public static hidebysig void EnableDynamicData(class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, class System.Type entityType, class System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2<string, object> defaultValues) cil managed

Docs.param: The data control to enable Dynamic Data behavior for.
The type to use for metadata.
The default values to use with the object.
Docs.summary: Enables Dynamic Data behavior for the specified data control.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void EnableDynamicData (this System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, Type entityType, object defaults);
.method public static hidebysig void EnableDynamicData(class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer control, class System.Type entityType, object defaults) cil managed
